title: Steam Deck Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.15.21
description:
Valve has done the impossible -- made a handheld. Let's talk about the Steam Deck, Black Panther, and Hideo Kojima's Tweets!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:04 - Housekeeping
TLOU2’s Shannon Woodward is on the Kinda Funny Podcast today! youtube.com/kindafunny and podcast services!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack!
The Roper Report  -
00:05:56 - Steam Deck Announced
00:31:50 - Black Panther Details, Nick Romano @ EW
00:47:20 - Ad
00:51:49 - No Star War at EA Play
00:57:30 - Netflix Going After Games, Lucas Shaw and Mark Gurman @ Bloomberg
01:02:40 - Hideo Kojima likes Hideo Kojima Trailer, Hideo Kojima @ Hideo Kojima’s Twitter
01:05:20 - Out today
01:08:04 - Squad Up:Casey Weinmann(PSN/PC) - Arox Lunarshroud
01:08:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing
